summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: The Lord Peter Wimsey Mysteries: Set 2 Review Date: 2016/01/25 Store: Ian Carmichael (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Mystery & Suspense Product Description: ['Ian Carmichael stars in the original British adaptations', '"Eternally appealing" --NPR’s Fresh Air', 'As seen on Masterpiece Theatre', '"Realized superbly" --', 'The New York Times', '"The cast is splendid" --', 'The Washington Post', 'IAN CARMICHAEL STARS in the original BBC adaptations of the Dorothy L. Sayers crime thrillers. Hailed by critics as one of the finest mystery series ever filmed, its success on PBS’s Masterpiece Theatre inspired the spin-off Mystery! Running at least three hours each, these dramas do full justice to Sayers’s vivid characters, trenchant wit, and lavish 1920s settings.', 'THE MYSTERIES:', 'MURDER MUST ADVERTISE Lord Peter goes deep undercover at Pym’s Publicity to investigate the suspicious death of a young copywriter following his affair with a wealthy and indolent socialite.', 'FIVE RED HERRINGS When the body of an unpopular artist is found in a stream, it’s up to Lord Peter to determine which of six suspects could have committed the crime.', 'THE NINE TAILORS Stranded in a sleepy village after a car accident, Lord Peter quickly stumbles upon a decades-old case of stolen emeralds, unidentifiable corpses, and coded messages.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Mystery & Suspense/British Mystery Theater, Television/Crime', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Ian Carmichael', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8435', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '10 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 28, 2010', 'Actors': 'Ian Carmichael', 'Studio': 'ACORN MEDIA', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: it arrived early and packaged well. played well and was very enjoyable. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/02/20 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alex Gabassi'], 'Producers': ['Mammoth Screen LTD', 'Agatha Christie Productions LTD', 'Farah Abushwesha'], 'Starring': ['John Malkovich', 'Rupert Grint', 'Andrew Buchan']} Review Text: I love this adaption! I've never been a fan of the David Suchet "Poirot". his character came across as prissy and more of a caricature than anything else. so to see the Poirot that Malkovich portrayed was such a treat, he brought depth to the character that was sadly lacking before.
I would highly recommend this to anyone even if they're not Agatha Christie fans. Review Title: ABC murders Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WWII In HD: Collector’s Edition Review Date: 2020/07/26 Store: Rob Lowe (Actor), Justin Bartha (Actor), Frederic Lumiere (Director), Matthew Ginsburg (Director) & 1 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Documentary Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Seventy years in the making. Three thousand hours of color footage few knew existed. The first documentary to show original color footage of World War II in immersive HD, the world premiere HISTORYTM series WWII IN HD uses the journals and accounts of those who served in the war s biggest battles to create a personal, introspective and detailed look at life on and off the front lines. This lavish gift set includes the original HISTORY series plus two specials: THE AIR WAR and IWO JIMA.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': 'unknown', 'Director': 'Frederic Lumiere, Matthew Ginsburg', 'Media Format': "Box set, NTSC, Collector's Edition", 'Run time': '7 hours and 35 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 15, 2012', 'Actors': 'Rob Lowe, Justin Bartha', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '5'} Review Text: this was a gift and the recipient said it was really good, accurate, entertaining. Review Title: DVD Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Murder, She Wrote: The Complete Series [DVD] Review Date: 2020/09/02 Store: Angela Lansbury (Actor), Tom Bosley (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Mystery & Suspense Product Description: ['Winner of four Golden Globes and nominated for 12 consecutive Emmy awards for Best Actress in a Drama, Angela Lansbury stars as the unforgettable Jessica Fletcher in the legendary murder mystery series Murder, She Wrote. Quick to outwit both criminals and cops when it comes to solving a murder, Jessica uses her considerable intellect, charm, and persistence to get to the bottom of every crime she encounters. For the first time ever, all 12 seasons are available on 63 discs in one complete collection. Featuring a sensational array of guest stars, including George Clooney, Shirley Jones, Courtney Cox, Leslie Nielson, Joaquin Phoenix, Mickey Rooney, and many more, Murder, She Wrote, the two-time Primetime Emmy and Golden Globe winner, is a must-own DVD set that will arrest your attention for all 264 thrilling episodes.Bonus Content:', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Three:', "The Great '80s TV Flashback", "The Great '80s TV Flashback", 'Bonus Episode - Magnum, P.I.: Season 7\xa0- Novel Connection', 'Bonus Episode - Magnum, P.I.: Season 7\xa0- Novel Connection', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Four:', 'Bonus Episode: Murder, She Wrote "Snow White, Blood Red"', 'Bonus Episode: Murder, She Wrote "Snow White, Blood Red"', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Five:', 'Origin of a Series', 'Origin of a Series', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Six:', 'Recipe for a Hit', 'Recipe for a Hit', "America's Top Sleuths", "America's Top Sleuths", 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Seven:', 'The Perils of Success', 'The Perils of Success', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Ten:', 'Bonus Episode - Amsterdam Kill', 'Bonus Episode - Amsterdam Kill', 'Murder, She Wrote: Season Eleven:', 'Bonus Episode - Big Easy Murder', 'Bonus Episode - Big Easy Murder', 'Bonus Episode - Home Care', 'Bonus Episode - Home Care'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Television, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'William Windom, Tom Bosley, Ron Masak, Angela Lansbury', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Number Of Discs': '63', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.4 x 7.7 x 7.2 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '212 hours and 5 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 1, 2013', 'Actors': 'Angela Lansbury, Tom Bosley, Ron Masak, William Windom', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '63'} Review Text: if you love the series, you won't be disappointed in this set. Review Title: wonderful Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/08/14 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Darren Aronofsky'], 'Producers': ['Scott Franklin', 'Ari Handel', 'Jeff Waxman', 'Josh Stern', 'Mark Heyman'], 'Starring': ['Jennifer Lawrence', 'Javier Bardem', 'Ed Harris'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Review Text: I can NOT believe MIchelle Pfeiffer and Ed Harris agreed to be a part of this garbage. This is pure crap from beginning to end. if this were on paper, I'd wouldn't wipe my butt on it. ohmygoodness, I wish I had words to adequately describe just how bad this is. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user demonstrates a clear appreciation for quality packaging and prompt delivery of products. Positive feedback highlights enjoyable viewing experiences, particularly regarding captivating adaptations of classic mystery series. Overall satisfaction is underscored by high ratings for products that feature beloved characters, strong performances, and engaging storytelling. The user values well-made documentaries and collections that accurately portray historical events, emphasizing both entertainment and educational value.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user expresses discontent with certain films perceived as poorly executed, using strong language to convey their disappointment. This reflects a significant dislike for content that does not meet their expectations for quality, particularly adaptations that fail to deliver depth and coherence. Mixed reviews indicate frustration with narratives that appear shallow or gimmicky, leading to feelings of dissatisfaction and wasted time.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user engages with a diverse array of media, showing a notable affinity for mystery and historical narratives. While they frequently report positive experiences with well-packaged and enjoyable products, there are fluctuations in satisfaction levels based on the perceived quality of specific titles. Positive reviews underscore a penchant for compelling storytelling and thorough adaptations, contrasting with negative experiences associated with disappointing films. Ultimately, the user's preferences reflect a balance of high expectations and a willingness to explore various genres.

target_interaction.title_meta: Clint Eastwood: The Universal Pictures 7-Movie Collection
description: Cool, tough and always classic, Clint Eastwood is a true American icon whose career has spanned more than seven decades. No decade impacted his growth more as an actor, director and legend than the pivotal years he spent at Universal Pictures between 1968 and 1975 when he made seven movies that laid the foundation for his superstardom. Clint Eastwood: The Universal Pictures 7-Movie Collection includes a selection of action-packed westerns (Two Mules for Sister Sara, Joe Kidd and High Plains Drifter) and edge-of-your-seat thrillers (Coogan's Bluff, The Beguiled, Play Misty For Me and The Eiger Sanction) that make up this important chapter of one of Hollywood's most unforgettable entertainers.Bonus Content:
Disc 2 - Two Mules For Sister Sara:
Play It Again... A Look Back at Play Misty For Me
Play It Again... A Look Back at Play Misty For Me
The Beguiled, Misty, Don and Clint
The Beguiled, Misty, Don and Clint
